name: Mojuso Poka Poka
description:
Get ready to POKA with Mojuso, Shanyu, Yuko, Rikara, and Dan! In single poka, poka your way trough the endless numbers of rounds! How far you can go!? In vs poka, you can poka against your friend! The one who survives wins! In Endless Poka, you can play up to 3 endless minigames like Speedy fever, Cumbo breaker, and normal mode! And in How To Play, you can learn all the basics toughout  the entire game! 

So now Mojuso and her friends are ready to poka to be the winner of the Poka battles!!
